name: Jing Ma 0002
content: academicpages is a ready-to-fork GitHub Pages template for academic personal websites - Jing Ma Jing Ma Assistant professor Department of Computer & Data Sciences Case Western Reserve University (CWRU) Follow Google Scholar DBLP Email LinkedIn Twitter Github I am a Timothy E. and Allison L. Schroeder Assistant Professor (tenure track) in the Department of Computer & Data Sciences at Case Western Reserve University (CWRU). Before that, I obtained my Ph.D. in the Department of Computer Science at University of Virginia (UVA) in 2023 summer, working with Prof. Jundong Li and Prof. Aidong Zhang. I obtained my master's degree and bachelor's degree at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU). Research Interest: I am broadly interested in machine learning and data mining. My current research mainly focuses on: Trustworthy AI: generalization, explanation, fairness, robustness, etc. Causality: causal machine learning, causal inference, causality in LLMs Graph learning: graph foundation models, graph neural networks LLMs: explanation/causality/safety/ethics in LLMs, LLM applications AI for social good: AI in important domains such as science and healthcare I am actively looking for self-motivated PhD/Master/intern students. Please feel free to send me an email with your CV if you are interested!
